title: NYC Deaf Chanukah Celebration
desc: It's back! For the second year in a row, the Jewish Deaf Foundation is thrilled to host the NYC Deaf Chanukah Celebration in the heart of the biggest Jewish Deaf community in the United States. Set to take place in the Upper East Side of Manhattan, with a program full of exciting features, this will be an event that draws over 400 attendees. Don't miss it! More information available at our website: www.jewishdeaffoundation.org/nycchanukah
